Name: Residency requirement for city employees and repealing sections 12-119, 12-120 and 12-121 of such code.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the residency requirement for city employees and repealing sections 12-119, 12-120 and 12-121 of such code.
BodyName: Committee on Civil Service and Labor

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Civil Service and Labor
This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

	Section 1.  Sections 12-119, 12-120 and 12-121 of the administrative code of the city of New York are REPEALED.
	Â§2.	This local law shall take effect immediately.
